scripts.move-abi-community-passport: rm -rf artifacts/CommunityPassport.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/community-passport && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/CommunityPassport.sol/CommunityPassport.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/CommunityPassport.json
scripts.move-abi-community-passport-creater: rm -rf artifacts/CommunityPassportCreater.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/community-passport-creater && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/CommunityPassportCreater.sol/CommunityPassportCreater.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/CommunityPassportCreater.json
scripts.move-abi-community-portal: rm -rf artifacts/CommunityPortal.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/community-portal && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/CommunityPortal.sol/CommunityPortal.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/CommunityPortal.json
scripts.move-abi-prize-poap: rm -rf artifacts/PrizePoap.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/prize-poap && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/PrizePoap.sol/PrizePoap.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/PrizePoap.json
scripts.move-abi-cube: rm -rf artifacts/Cube.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/cube && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/Cube.sol/Cube.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/Cube.json
scripts.move-abi-quest-board: rm -rf artifacts/QuestBoard.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/quest-board && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/QuestBoard.sol/QuestBoard.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/QuestBoard.json
scripts.move-abi-quest-checker: rm -rf artifacts/IQuestChecker.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/quest-checker && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/IQuestChecker.sol/IQuestChecker.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/IQuestChecker.json
scripts.move-abi-quest-checker-creater: rm -rf artifacts/QuestCheckerCreater.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/quest-checker-creater && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/QuestCheckerCreater.sol/QuestCheckerCreater.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/QuestCheckerCreater.json
scripts.move-abi-quest-poap: rm -rf artifacts/QuestPoap.json && cd ../neiverse-contracts/quest-poap && npx hardhat compile && cp -rf artifacts/contracts/QuestPoap.sol/QuestPoap.json ../../neiverse-front/artifacts/QuestPoap.json
scripts.move-abi: npm run move-abi-community-passport && npm run move-abi-community-passport-creater && npm run move-abi-community-portal && npm run move-abi-prize-poap && npm run move-abi-cube && npm run move-abi-quest-board && npm run move-abi-quest-checker && npm run move-abi-quest-checker-creater && npm run move-abi-quest-poap
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint
scripts.update: npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu' && npx -p npm-check-updates  -c 'ncu -u' && npm i
